feature_support.notes: inout ports are valid IEEE 1800 SystemVerilog, supported by all major tools

known_limitations.notes: arcilator does not support inout ports (converts to !llhd.ref type which fails in LowerState pass)

classification.reason: Valid SystemVerilog test case causes crash in CIRCT arcilator. All major EDA tools accept this code without errors. This is a legitimate bug in arcilator's handling of inout ports.

bug_details.root_cause: inout ports are converted to !llhd.ref type which is not supported by arc::StateType::get()
